pull.title: Trivial changes
pull.body:
It's been a while now, so here's what's piled up in trivial.

Fwiw, since we dropped the policy on header include order, I'll start NACKing those changes in trivial from this point forward, unless they're necessary for some specific reason. With the current modularization effort that constantly touches includes, they just cause unnecessary merge conflicts.

I'll also be more picky about arbitrary cosmetic changes, as they could ping/pong forever.

events.message:
[Qt] header group cleanup

- seperate core from GUI headers where this was missing
- remove an unneeded new-line
Remove folder and images for bootstrap.md
Add x86_64* i686* mips* and arm* to depends .gitignore
Fix docs for 'complete' field in 'signrawtransaction' response

Point to the Debian 7.8 installer

Link to 7.7 is broken.
Replaced current function names with __func__ in LogPrintf() calls.

Removed '()' where used without contents inside

This additional patch removes '()' from current function name in LogPrintf output.
Fix typo in init.cpp interpration/interpretation
Use https link to bitcoin.org in Doxygen intro
Update REST URL to match reality
[Trivial] format sync.h
Re-wrote a passage of text that was difficult to understand.

Remove leftover strlcpy.h copyright

src/strlcpy.h was removed by https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/commit/6032e4f4e7c1892a4e3f0a1a2007e4cd0fe99937
depends: latest config.guess and config.sub

[Qt, Trivial] misc minor string changes

- write "Bitcoins" uppercase
- replace secure/insecure for payment requests with
  authenticated/unauthenticated
- change a translatable string for payment request expiry to match another
  existing string to only get ONE resulting string to translate
[Qt, Trivial] fix header groupings + space, intdentation fixes
[Qt, Trivial] remove two unneeded includes of wallet/db.h

Make 'Default: %u' spacing consistent in help message

Comment by pryds on Transifex.

ensure consistent header comment naming conventions

- BITCOIN_FOLDER_SUBFOLDER_FILENAME_H
Add operator names to DNS Seed list
trivial string change in wallet.cpp (the -> that)

events.body:
> I'll also be more picky about arbitrary cosmetic changes, as they could ping/pong forever
> 
> Fwiw, since we dropped the policy on header include order, I'll start NACKing those changes in trivial 

Indeed.

@laanwj Looks like one nit is missing in the merged commit: seed.bitcoinstats.com is operated by Christian Decker.
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/commit/6a0bcb80e4ce380a39f81b4fb01150d5b7e6cdf7

comments.body: one new space before "for old block".
This seems to be not THE Pieter Wuille, we all know ;)?

@theuni https://github.com/theuni/bitcoin/pull/17
You just need to rebase to current master I guess...
